p: The herb of A. absinthium is used today mainly to improve digestion. The plant is part of the pharmacopoeial (11th PF) Polish national herbal mixture Species digestivae together with Cichorii radix, Angelicae archangelicae radix, Carvi fructus and Gentianae radix. The tincture of A. absinthium ( Absinthii tinctura) also has its pharmacopoeial monograph [ 65].
